title: Apricot stuffed pork roast
ingredients: ['100g unsalted butter, softened', '1/2 teaspoon dried rosemary', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1.5kg boneless pork loin', '1L water', '150g dried apricots', '1 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon ground caraway seeds', '1/2 teaspoon paprika', '3 tablespoons apricot conserve', '3 tablespoons flaked almonds']
